project.objective: Green Star Marine AB is developing to commercialize a disruptive electric propulsion system for water vessels, contributing to fossil fuel decrease, environment sustainability while delivering a comfortable, reliable, cheap and highly capable marine vehicle transportation. GSMÂ´s goal is to provide their solution to the <100 hp segment in this multi-billion market where greens solutions are expected to gain market shares primary from traditional inboard/outboard combustion engines.
project.title: Green Marine Propulsion
